title: I want Nerolac, Asian, Dulux, or more paint company dealership. What is the investment? - Quora

response.answer_text: Housepicious is the right place to get multiple paint company dealership under one roof. Housepicious provides paint dealership for Asian paints, Berger paints and Nerolac Paints at fairly reasonable prices. Businessmen aspiring to amplify their units can reach out to Housepicious and get dealerships for highest grossing brands at minimal prices. If an individual seeks dealership from the company directly and there is already a dealer located nearby them, they deny the dealership to the starting out a business. In addition, a dealer is allowed to sell paint from only one company of their choice from Asian Paints, Nerolac or Berger Paints. This has become a big problem for those businesses that are starting out. Housespicious looks after these problems by allowing the dealers to place products of various brands under one roof! All this and more with an starting investment of just 3 lakh rupees for an individual dealership when the other brands would not settle for less than 20 lakhs! Housepicious franchisee does not only come with multiple paint dealership but also helps you to start & execute your business by registering it with MSME, installing a digital order system and provides multiple benefits to flourish your business in minimal investment. P.s: For more information visit Housepicious website: www.Housepicious.com OR you can write us to Bdm.maahi@housepicious.com/ +91-7988262587. Please visit: Housepicious - Paint Franchise Business
